properties.address: Insall Road, Warrington, Cheshire WA2 0HD
properties.description: Fearnhead Community Centre – Your Local Hub for Connection and Creativity. Step inside a vibrant, welcoming space designed for everyone in the community. At Fearnhead Community Centre, there’s always something happening! From exercise sessions and arts & crafts classes to college courses, digital skills workshops, and more – it’s a place where learning, wellbeing, and fun come together. At the heart of the centre is our Community Café, open Monday to Wednesday. It’s a warm and inclusive spot where you can enjoy a cuppa, share a meal with friends, or simply relax in a cosy corner. While you’re here, you can also discover what’s on at the centre and access health & wellbeing support, connecting you with services and activities that matter most to you. Whether you’re looking to learn something new, meet people, or just take a break, Fearnhead Community Centre is here for you.
properties.title: Fearnhead Cross Community Centre

properties.address: Market Gate, Warrington, Cheshire WA1 1XG
properties.description: Coffee Bar is open between 10am and 12 noon on Mondays and Wednesdays, and between 10am and 1pm on Fridays. We offer a welcoming, accessible & supportive space to all; a warm, inclusive, non-judgmental space where people can find community, make friends, receive pastoral care, be connected with other services or simply enjoy a hot drink and some food (all free of charge). We provide hot and cold refreshments, good conversation and a very popular crafts & activities table. Steve, our Pastoral Support Worker & Coffee Bar Coordinator, is supported by an experienced team of friendly volunteers. Our team is on hand to help in any way we can. Set right at the heart of Warrington’s town centre, Coffee Bar has provided a cherished place of community, friendship and belonging for almost 40 years. If you haven’t visited us before, please watch https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K8Shfe0KHQQ to get a flavour of who we are and what we do.
properties.title: Holy Trinity Coffee Bar
